Text:
Many thanks to all of F.A.R.T. for restoring 60 episodes of one of the best drama series ever!
YouÂ´ve brought The Fugitive into the 21st century :) Will you continue with season 4 when the DVDs are released?

By the way, are there any more Barry Morse Intros (besides "Five Barry Morse Intros") from the first season available? Love those little gems :) Also IÂ´ve read that the soundtracks of "The Garden House" and "Where the action is" have been altered for the DVD release. Could you make a FART Version of those episodes?

Once again many thanks for all your work!!
